name: Cyclades
description:
Cyclades iPad is a transposition of the board game Cyclades created by Ludovic Maublanc and Bruno Cathala and published by Les Editions du Matagot.

This game for two players is done to fight in the context of the Ancient Greece in the cyclades island chain. With the gods' benediction and the help of famous mythologic creatures, recruit troops, build ships, strongholds, ports and metropolis. The fight to have the greatest city is gonna be terrible.

Gold MEDAL on boardgame.fr

This version allows two human players to compete in a fight.

More coming soon.......

BOARDGAME.FR - Gold Medal - : "Cyclades iPad is a game that immerses you in the heart of Olympus thanks to a background and pictures of great beauty. The game allows you, using an exemplary and a well thought out ergonomics, to spend some quality time. all this is well worth a boardgame OR."
